title: BillByte ($BBY)
tagline: The Coin That Connects Paper and Digital Wealth
about_content: BillByte is a revolutionary cryptocurrency that bridges the gap between physical cash and digital assets. By combining the tangible value of traditional currency with the efficiency of blockchain technology, BillByte creates a seamless financial ecosystem accessible to everyone.
expectation_content: BillByte aims to transform how we perceive and use money. With a focus on simplicity and community, we expect to create a financial system that empowers individuals and businesses alike, providing the stability of physical currency with the innovation of digital assets.
mining_title: ðŸ§¬ Mining BBY... AI hash rate: Matrix Stable
supporter_description: By supporting BillByte, you contribute to the creation of a revolutionary financial ecosystem that merges physical and digital. Choose your support level:
roadmap_description: Discover the planned evolution of BillByte and the next steps in our development.
phase1_desc: Development of the fundamental concept and creation of the initial community.
phase2_desc: Creation of the first wallet and implementation of the mining mechanism.
phase3_desc: Alpha version launch and integration with Telegram.
phase4_desc: Development of bridges with existing blockchains and creation of first use cases.
phase5_desc: International deployment and integration with traditional financial systems.
vote_description: As a member of the BillByte community, your voice matters! Participate in decisions that will shape the future of our ecosystem.
vote_option1_desc: Should we create a bridge to BSC to facilitate exchanges?
vote_option2_desc: Creation of a rewards system for active supporters.
vote_option3_desc: Adopt the new interface proposed by our design team.
register_description: Register to become an official member and participate in the development of our ecosystem.
